hadith.text: Narrated Jabir b. 'Abd Allah :The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) forbade muhaqalah, muzabanah, mukhabarah, and mu'awanah. One of the two narrators from Hammad said the word mu'awamah, and other said: "selling many years ahead". The agreed version then goes: and thunya, but gave license for 'araya
